creator: foongkim@yahoo.com
text:
When i try to stop my tomcat 5.5.15 with this command, ./shutdown.sh. i will 
notice this line of information statement at the bottom of my log file 
(CATALINA_HOME/logs/Catalina_[today_date].log):
INFO : Failed shutdown of Apache Portable Runtime

I have verified that the server did stop after the ./shutdown.sh command 
issues, but then what is this Failed shutdown message mean? Please help and 
advice what shall i do to remove this error/problems.

Thank you.

APR is a portability library, please consult with the Tomcat project for
possible meanings of this error.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Unfortunately reclassifying a bug does not update the various mailing lists
that are auto-notified of the incident.  Please open a fresh bug, sorry I didn't
point this out when I initially invalidated your incident.
